channel.title: Comments on: Social networks as communities for weak social ties

item.title: By: binance hesap olusturma
item.dc:creator: binance hesap olusturma
item.description: Thanks for sharing. I read many of your blog posts, cool, your blog is very good.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for sharing. I read many of your blog posts, cool, your blog is very good.

item.title: By: gate io giriş
item.dc:creator: gate io giriş
item.description: Your article made me suddenly realize that I am writing a thesis on gate.io. After reading your article, I have a different way of thinking, thank you. However, I still have some doubts, can you help me? Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Your article made me suddenly realize that I am writing a thesis on gate.io. After reading your article, I have a different way of thinking, thank you. However, I still have some doubts, can you help me? Thanks.

item.title: By: gate borsası
item.dc:creator: gate borsası
item.description: After reading your article, it reminded me of some things about gate io that I studied before. The content is similar to yours, but your thinking is very special, which gave me a different idea. Thank you. But I still have some questions I want to ask you, I will always pay attention. Thanks.
item.content:encoded: After reading your article, it reminded me of some things about gate io that I studied before. The content is similar to yours, but your thinking is very special, which gave me a different idea. Thank you. But I still have some questions I want to ask you, I will always pay attention. Thanks.
